en.faq_architecture_q1: How does Blue's platform architecture work?
en.faq_architecture_a1: Blue uses a hierarchical structure: Organizations contain Workspaces, which contain Records with Custom Fields. This allows for flexible organization from individual tasks to enterprise-wide operations.
en.faq_architecture_q2: What are the differences between Workspaces and Records?
en.faq_architecture_a2: Workspaces are projects or ongoing processes that contain multiple Records. Records are individual items like tasks, customers, or deals. Each Record can have multiple Custom Fields to capture specific data.
en.faq_architecture_q3: Can I customize the platform for my specific needs?
en.faq_architecture_a3: Yes, Blue offers extensive customization through 24 Custom Field types, unlimited automation rules, multiple view options, and custom user permissions. You can structure your data exactly how your business works.
en.faq_technical_q1: What API access does Blue provide?
en.faq_technical_a1: Blue provides 100% API coverage through GraphQL, including queries, mutations, and real-time subscriptions. This gives you complete programmatic access to all platform features.
en.faq_technical_q2: How many integrations does Blue support?
en.faq_technical_a2: Blue connects with 5,000+ tools through integration partners like Zapier, Make.com, Pabbly Connect, Albato, and Boost.space. We also provide webhooks and a full API for custom integrations.
en.faq_technical_q3: What kind of automation can I create?
en.faq_technical_a3: Blue's automation engine supports unlimited workflows with triggers, conditions, and actions. You can automate everything from simple status updates to complex multi-step business processes without coding.
en.faq_enterprise_q1: What is White Label and how does it work?
en.faq_enterprise_a1: White Label allows you to completely rebrand Blue with your own logo, colors, and domain. Remove all Blue branding and make the platform appear as your own internal system.
en.faq_enterprise_a2: Blue offers granular, project-level permissions with custom roles. You can control exactly who can see and do what across different projects, and invite external users without affecting your billing.
en.faq_enterprise_q3: What kind of audit trails does Blue provide?
en.faq_enterprise_a3: Blue provides comprehensive audit logs that track every action taken in your workspace, including who made changes, what was changed, and when. This ensures complete accountability and compliance.
